nodes.text: Syvris was a small moon in the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy located at galactic coordinates T-13. It was part of the Triellus Trade Route, which connected it to the worlds Dubrava and Arami. Another hyperspace route connected it to the Hutt Space world of Hollastin.

The moon was ruled by the Hutt Princess Roola, who protected it for years from the dread pirate Rance. The Mon Calamari Basz then made a deal with Rance, and promised to make introductions between Roola and Pashda the Hutt, who had a stronghold on the planet Toydaria. Pashda traveled to the stronghold so Basz could introduce them.

Basz then found a group of spacers whom he had a grudge against and claimed that Roola needed to be saved from Pashda. The group fought their way through Pashda's stronghold to rescue the ruler of Syvris, but once the spacers located her Basz opened fire on the stronghold, intending to destroy it and kill the spacers and Pashda in the process.

Syvris was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. The world originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the "Galaxywide NewsNets" article written by Paul Sudlow and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 13 in 1997.
